name: ext_R4_AdverseEvent_su_causality
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AdverseEvent|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R3.

element.short: Information on the possible cause of the event
element.definition: `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality` maps to R3 `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality`. Has no type mapping Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). `causality` added a required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/adverse-event-causality`. So is mapped as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url
